targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(<time_column>) as time_sec,
  <value column> as value,
  <series name column> as metric
FROM <table name>
WHERE $__timeFilter(time_column)
ORDER BY <time_column> ASC

SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(<time_column>) as time_sec,
  <value column> as value,
  <series name column> as metric
FROM <table name>
WHERE $__timeFilter(time_column)
ORDER BY <time_column> ASC

SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(<time_column>) as time_sec,
  <value column> as value,
  <series name column> as metric
FROM <table name>
WHERE $__timeFilter(time_column)
ORDER BY <time_column> ASC

SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(<time_column>) as time_sec,
  <value column> as value,
  <series name column> as metric
FROM <table name>
WHERE $__timeFilter(time_column)
ORDER BY <time_column> ASC

SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(<time_column>) as time_sec,
  <value column> as value,
  <series name column> as metric
FROM <table name>
WHERE $__timeFilter(time_column)
ORDER BY <time_column> ASC

SELECT
  now() AS "time",
  customerName AS metric,
  sum(TotalCommande) AS "TotalCommande"
FROM finances
group by customerName
ORder by totalcommande desc;

SELECT
  now() AS "time",
  country AS metric,
  turnover
FROM finances2
ORDER BY turnover

panels.title: Turnover per country over the last 2 months

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  now() AS "time",
  NomProduit AS metric,
  QuantiteEnStock
FROM logistics
ORDER BY now()

panels.title: Stock of the most ordered products

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  now() AS "time",
  NomProduit AS metric,
  NombreVendu

FROM logistics
ORDER BY now()

panels.title: Unit sold of the most ordered products

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
NOW() AS "time", 
concat(lastname, " ", firstname, " - ", salesrepemployeenumber) AS metric, 
turnover 
FROM hr 
order by now();

SELECT
  date AS "time",
  Catégorie AS metric,
  QuantitéVendue AS "QuantitéVendue"
FROM sales
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(date)
ORDER BY date

panels.title: Number of Products Sold by Category and by Month

targets.rawSql: select ville, turnover, latitude, longitude from map;

SELECT
  now() as "time",
  customerName as metric,
  nombredecommandes
  from clientsfideles
  where nombredecommandes >= 10
  order by now()

SELECT productname, quantityinstock,commandes,quantityinstock/commandes AS ratio
FROM stocks
ORDER BY ratio DESC

SELECT * FROM toys_and_models.finances
ORDER BY customerNumber,orderdate;

SELECT customernumber, customerName, ordernumber, TotalCommande from finances
order by customerName, TotalCommande;
SELECT * from finances2;
select * from hr;
SELECT * from logistics;
SELECT Catégorie, AnnéeEnCours, MoisEnCours, QuantitéVendue, AnnéePrécédente, QuantitéAnnéePrécédente, RateOfChange from sales;
select turnover, pays, ville from map;

select * from clientsfideles
where nombredecommandes>= 10;
SELECT * from stocks;
SELECT commandes, productcode, quantityInStock, productname from stocks;
